summary: REQ-1 cannot be confirmed from the provided (truncated) Layout.tsx diff; the visible changes largely add new error-boundary/safe-wrapper behavior and update project metadata/summaries with unrelated claims.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the shared public Layout so the global site header is not rendered on /admin-panel/* routes, while keeping the header visible on all other routes (including /admin login).
missing_requirements.reason: The provided Layout.tsx diff is truncated before any conditional rendering logic is shown. While `useLocation` is imported, the excerpt only shows new error boundary and safe wrapper components; no evidence is shown that Header rendering is actually conditioned on paths starting with "/admin-panel" (and not on "/admin").

hallucinated_features.description: Added a layout-specific Error Boundary with custom fallback UI ("Layout Error", reload button, dev-only error details).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; the BuildRequest only asks to hide the global Header on /admin-panel/* routes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added SafeHeader/SafeFooter wrappers that catch render errors and display fallback UI (e.g., "Header failed to load", "Footer failed to load").
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; also introduces new user-facing text and changes header/footer failure behavior beyond hiding the header on specific routes.

hallucinated_features.description: Wrapped Outlet in Suspense with a global loading UI ("Loading page...") and additional fallback error UI ("Page Error").
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; changes loading/error behavior for route rendering.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/introduced project metadata describing additional feature requests (e.g., replacing header/footer logos site-wide) beyond hiding the header on /admin-panel/* routes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of the BuildRequest scope; introduces unrelated request tracking/state changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified frontend-file-summaries.txt to claim numerous unrelated UI/routing/logo changes (e.g., new /control/site-settings route, new uploaded logo, multiple page redesign/animation changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; and these claims are not supported by the actual code diffs shown (only Layout.tsx + metadata/summaries are modified in this diff summary).
